div.bibl: Saloniki, June 13, 1931GRADUATION AT ST. ANDREW SCHOOL

body.p: p. 5.- The Greek-American school of St. Andrew tomorrow, Sunday, June 14th, will hold its graduation exercises in the auditorium of the church.

The exercises will begin at 3 P.M. The Greek people of Chicago are urgently invited to witness the results of the educational work of the School during the year. The Executive Committee of the School will consider it an honor to have the auditorium crowded.
